p: During June 2017-November 2018, we performed the HBV survey within 16 health facility catchment areas (4 rural and 12 urban) in Lusaka Province. We selected 2,173 households for inclusion in the study, and 1,765 (81.2%) participated. A total of 4,966 adults participated (an average of 2.8 per household; Fig 1) including 1,019 (20.5%) from rural areas. Median age was 32 years (interquartile range, 24â€“44), 3,118 (62.9%) were women, of whom 217 (7.0%) were pregnant, and 53.4% had at least some secondary education. None of the participants reported prior knowledge of HBV status.
